# Defining our workflows {.unnumbered}

We define workflows as the personal space, habits, and tools we use to complete and share our work.

Jenny Bryan, who thinks a lot about and designs software to streamline workflows, says: 

> there's a distinction between things you do because of personal taste & habits (“workflow”) versus the logic and output that is the essence of your project (“product”). (CITE)
